name: Wasteland Warriors
description: Survive the end of the world with mutated creatures, wasteland champions, and survival skills

cards.title: Mad Max
cards.description: The ultimate road warrior with unmatched vehicular combat skills
cards.imageDescription: Leather-clad warrior with shotgun, standing next to a heavily modified combat vehicle in desert wasteland
cards.effect: On summon: +2 damage to all champions this turn; Passive: Gain 1 MP when you play a skill
cards.flavor: What a lovely day.

cards.title: Predator's Ambush
cards.description: Strike from the shadows like a true wasteland hunter
cards.imageDescription: Scavenger hiding behind wrecked car, ready to attack unsuspecting prey
cards.effect: Deal 5 damage to target champion, then draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, the hunter becomes the hunted.

cards.title: Radiation Storm
cards.description: Unleash a toxic cloud of radioactive particles
cards.imageDescription: Green radioactive cloud spreading across a ruined city landscape
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to all champions, opponent champions lose 1 MP regeneration
cards.flavor: The gift that keeps on giving... death.

cards.title: Scavenge Resources
cards.description: Search the ruins for useful supplies and equipment
cards.imageDescription: Survivor rummaging through abandoned building, finding useful items
cards.effect: Add 2 random common cards from your collection to your hand
cards.flavor: One man's trash is another man's treasure.

cards.title: Fallout Shelter
cards.description: Take cover in a reinforced bunker to avoid radiation
cards.imageDescription: Survivors huddled in underground bunker with thick concrete walls
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, restore 2 HP
cards.flavor: The safest place during a nuclear war is underground.

cards.title: Mutant Berserker Rage
cards.description: Enter a frenzied state of enhanced strength and aggression
cards.imageDescription: Mutated human with enhanced muscles, glowing red eyes, in combat stance
cards.effect: Your champions gain +3 damage this turn, but lose 2 HP
cards.flavor: The radiation didn't just change them, it made them unstoppable.

cards.title: Vault-Tec Technology
cards.description: Advanced pre-war technology that gives you an edge
cards.imageDescription: Futuristic vault door opening, revealing high-tech equipment inside
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Better living through science... and radiation.

cards.title: Giant Rad-Scorpion
cards.description: A massive mutated arachnid with deadly venomous stingers
cards.imageDescription: Huge glowing green scorpion with multiple eyes, crawling through radioactive wasteland
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 3 damage to target; Passive: Opponent champions lose 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: Size matters, especially when you're packing that much venom.

cards.title: Feral Ghoul
cards.description: A decomposed human that has become a mindless, aggressive creature
cards.imageDescription: Rotting humanoid with glowing eyes, reaching out with clawed hands
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by healing effects
cards.flavor: Death couldn't stop them, and neither will you.

cards.title: Super Mutant Behemoth
cards.description: A towering mutated giant with incredible strength and durability
cards.imageDescription: Massive green-skinned mutant with huge muscles, wielding a massive club
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 3 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 3
cards.flavor: Big, green, and angry doesn't even begin to describe it.

cards.title: Vault Boy Overlord
cards.description: The ultimate vault dweller who has mastered both pre-war technology and wasteland survival
cards.imageDescription: Smiling vault boy with glowing eyes, surrounded by advanced technology and wasteland weapons
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 4 HP to all your champions; Passive: All your creatures gain +1 HP; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: When life gives you radiation, make atomic cocktails.

cards.title: Wasteland King
cards.description: The supreme ruler of the post-apocalyptic world, commanding loyalty through fear and respect
cards.imageDescription: Charismatic warlord in makeshift armor, sitting on a throne of scrap metal and vehicle parts
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your creatures gain +1 damage; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: In the ashes of civilization, I rise to claim what's left.

cards.title: Radiation Beast Alpha
cards.description: The ultimate mutated creature that has adapted perfectly to the radioactive wasteland
cards.imageDescription: Massive glowing mutated beast with multiple eyes and tentacles, surrounded by radioactive aura
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 4 damage to all enemy champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: Evolution didn't stop when the bombs fell - it accelerated.

cards.title: Master Survivalist
cards.description: The ultimate prepper who predicted the apocalypse and prepared for every possible scenario
cards.imageDescription: Highly equipped survivor with advanced gear and weapons, standing in a fortified bunker
cards.effect: On summon: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn; When attacking: Heal 2 HP to player
cards.flavor: While others panicked, I was already three steps ahead. Preparedness is survival.

cards.title: Mech Walker
cards.description: A heavily armored combat walker that dominates the wasteland with superior firepower
cards.imageDescription: Massive bipedal war machine with multiple weapon systems, striding through ruined cityscape
cards.effect: On summon: +3 damage to all champions this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events; When attacking: Deal 3 damage to target
cards.flavor: Flesh and blood may fail, but steel and fire never tire.

cards.title: Plague Doctor
cards.description: A mysterious figure who has mastered both healing and the deadly pathogens of the wasteland
cards.imageDescription: Eerie figure in a bird-like mask with medical equipment, surrounded by both healing light and dark aura
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 5 HP to all your champions; Passive: When you play a creature, deal 1 damage to all opponents; When attacking: Choose to heal 3 HP or deal 3 damage
cards.flavor: I bring both salvation and damnation - choose wisely which you need.

cards.title: Wasteland Ambush
cards.description: Use the terrain to your advantage and strike from hiding
cards.imageDescription: Scavengers emerging from behind wrecked vehicles and rubble to attack unsuspecting enemies
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, if it survives draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, every shadow hides a potential threat.

cards.title: Nuclear Strike
cards.description: Call down a devastating nuclear bombardment
cards.imageDescription: Missile silo launching nuclear warheads into the sky, explosions visible on the horizon
cards.effect: Deal 8 damage to all champions, both players lose 3 HP
cards.flavor: The ultimate equalizer - death from above.

cards.title: Radioactive Decay
cards.description: Expose enemies to lingering radiation that continues to damage them
cards.imageDescription: Green radioactive mist clinging to wounded survivors, causing ongoing damage
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion now and 2 more damage next turn
cards.flavor: Radiation is a gift that keeps on giving.

cards.title: Junk Fortification
cards.description: Build defensive barriers from scrap and debris
cards.imageDescription: Survivors quickly constructing defensive walls from car parts and metal scraps
cards.effect: All your champions gain +2 DP this turn, prevent 3 damage
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, creativity is survival.

cards.title: Mutant Regeneration
cards.description: Harness the power of mutation to rapidly heal wounds
cards.imageDescription: Mutated survivor's wounds closing rapidly with glowing green energy
cards.effect: Restore 5 HP to target champion, gain 1 fatigue
cards.flavor: Mutation isn't just about the changes you can see - it's about what you become.

cards.title: Wasteland Scavenging
cards.description: Search the ruins for valuable resources and equipment
cards.imageDescription: Scavengers carefully searching through rubble and abandoned buildings for useful items
cards.effect: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, choose 2 to draw
cards.flavor: One person's trash is another person's treasure - if you're desperate enough.

cards.title: Radiation Sickness
cards.description: Expose enemies to debilitating radiation poisoning
cards.imageDescription: Survivor clutching their stomach in pain, green radiation symbols floating around them
cards.effect: Target champion loses 2 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Radiation doesn't just kill you - it makes the process thoroughly unpleasant.

cards.title: Scrap Metal Shield
cards.description: Use pieces of metal as improvised armor
cards.imageDescription: Survivor wearing makeshift armor made from car parts and metal scraps
cards.effect: Prevent 3 damage to target champion this turn
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, protection comes from whatever you can scavenge.

cards.title: Wasteland Stamina
cards.description: Endure the harsh conditions through sheer willpower
cards.imageDescription: Tough survivor pushing through exhaustion in the harsh wasteland environment
cards.effect: Target champion can attack again this turn
cards.flavor: Only the strong survive, and only the survivors grow stronger.

cards.title: Jury-Rig Repairs
cards.description: Make quick repairs with whatever materials are available
cards.imageDescription: Mechanic using duct tape and spare parts to repair damaged equipment
cards.effect: Restore 3 HP to target champion
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, perfect is the enemy of functional.

cards.title: Wasteland Vision
cards.description: Use experience to spot hidden threats and opportunities
cards.imageDescription: Experienced survivor scanning the horizon for dangers and resources
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Experience is the best teacher, assuming you live long enough to learn.

cards.title: Radioactive Burst
cards.description: Release a concentrated burst of radiation
cards.imageDescription: Mutant releasing a cone of green radioactive energy from their hands
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion and 1 damage to all other champions
cards.flavor: Radiation spreads, and so does its deadly touch.

cards.title: Wasteland Fortitude
cards.description: Draw strength from years of surviving harsh conditions
cards.imageDescription: Hardened survivor standing strong against harsh wasteland conditions
cards.effect: Target champion gains +1 AP and +1 DP this turn
cards.flavor: The wasteland doesn't just test your strength - it forges it.

cards.title: Scavenger Swarm
cards.description: Call upon a group of desperate scavengers to aid you
cards.imageDescription: Group of ragged scavengers swarming around a target, overwhelming with numbers
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to target champion 3 times
cards.flavor: In numbers, even the weak can become dangerous.

cards.title: Wasteland Endurance
cards.description: Push through pain and fatigue with sheer determination
cards.imageDescription: Battered survivor continuing to fight despite injuries and exhaustion
cards.effect: Target champion can attack again this turn, gain 2 fatigue
cards.flavor: The will to survive is stronger than any wound.

cards.title: Radioactive Adaptation
cards.description: Evolve to survive in the most radioactive environments
cards.imageDescription: Mutant's body adapting to radiation exposure, becoming more resilient
cards.effect: Target champion gains resistance to damage under 3 this turn
cards.flavor: Evolution accelerates in the face of extinction.

cards.title: Wasteland Raider
cards.description: A desperate survivor who takes what they need by force
cards.imageDescription: Rough-looking survivor with makeshift weapons, ready to raid and pillage
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: In the wasteland, the only law is survival.

cards.title: Giant Rad-Rat
cards.description: A mutated rodent that has grown to alarming proportions
cards.imageDescription: Massive rat with glowing red eyes, scurrying through radioactive wasteland
cards.effect: Passive: When you play a creature, deal 1 damage to target champion
cards.flavor: Size isn't everything, but it helps when you're trying to survive.
